context.introduction: Master the art of cooking pasta perfectly. Learn the essential techniques that separate good pasta from great pasta.

sections.title: The Perfect Texture
sections.content: Italian pasta has a specific texture that's firm yet tender. This balance takes practice and attention to timing.

sections.title: Water Preparation
sections.content: The water you cook pasta in affects the final result. The amount of salt matters more than you might think.

sections.title: Common Mistakes
sections.content: Many home cooks add ingredients to pasta water that actually work against achieving perfect results.

sections.title: Pro Tips
listItems: Test your pasta before the package time suggests
The pasta water becomes part of your sauce
Timing is everything - pasta waits for no one
